description: External tools required for the binary-compressed checkpoint phase (additional tools beyond build-infra)

liblzma-dev.description: LZMA compression library development files (required for ELF compression)
liblzma-dev.notes: Required for static linking in Linux ELF compression tools

libssl-dev.description: OpenSSL development files (required for SHA-512 hashing in compression tools)
libssl-dev.notes: Ubuntu 22.04 uses OpenSSL 3.0.2. Required for static linking SHA-512 hash calculation in ELF decompressor.
